org.corfudb.runtime.clients

Class ManagementClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.clients.ManagementClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient

    public class ManagementClient
extends Object
    A client to the Management Server.

    Failure Detection: This client allows a client to trigger failures handlers with relevant failures.

    Created by zlokhandwala on 11/4/16.

    • Method Detail

      • bootstrapManagement

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> bootstrapManagement(Layout l)
        Bootstraps a management server.
        Parameters:
        l - The layout to bootstrap with.
        Returns:
        A completable future which will return TRUE if the bootstrap was successful, false otherwise.

      • handleFailure

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> handleFailure(long detectorEpoch,
                                                Set<String> failedNodes)
        Sends the failure detected to the relevant management server.
        Parameters:
        failedNodes - The failed nodes set to be handled.
        Returns:
        A future which will be return TRUE if completed successfully else returns FALSE.

      • handleHealing

        public CompletableFuture<Boolean> handleHealing(long detectorEpoch,
                                                Set<String> healedNodes)
        Sends the healed nodes detected to the relevant management server.
        Parameters:
        healedNodes - The healed nodes set to be handled.
        Returns:
        A future which will be return TRUE if completed successfully else returns FALSE.

      • sendHeartbeatRequest

        public CompletableFuture<ClusterState> sendHeartbeatRequest()
        Requests for a heartbeat message containing the node status.
        Returns:
        A future which will return the node health metrics of the node which was requested for the heartbeat.

      • getLayout

        public CompletableFuture<Layout> getLayout()
        Requests for the layout persisted by the management server.
        Returns:
        A future which returns the layout persisted by the management server on completion.

      • addNodeRequest

        public CreateWorkflowResponse addNodeRequest(@Nonnull
                                             String endpoint)
                                      throws TimeoutException
        Send a add node request to an orchestrator
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to add to the cluster
        Returns:
        create workflow response that contains the uuid of the workflow
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - when the rpc times out

      • healNodeRequest

        public CreateWorkflowResponse healNodeRequest(@Nonnull
                                              String endpoint,
                                              boolean isLayoutServer,
                                              boolean isSequencerServer,
                                              boolean isLogUnitServer,
                                              int stripeIndex)
                                       throws TimeoutException
        Creates a workflow request to heal a node.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - Endpoint of the node to be healed.
        isLayoutServer - True if the node to be healed is a layout server.
        isSequencerServer - True if the node to be healed is a sequencer server.
        isLogUnitServer - True if the node to be healed is a logunit server.
        stripeIndex - Stripe index of the node if it is a logunit server.
        Returns:
        CreateWorkflowResponse which gives the workflowId.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - when the rpc times out

      • queryRequest

        public QueryResponse queryRequest(@Nonnull
                                  UUID workflowId)
                           throws TimeoutException
        Query the state of a workflow on a particular orchestrator.
        Parameters:
        workflowId - the workflow to query
        Returns:
        Query response that contains whether the workflow is running or not
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - when the rpc times out

      • removeNode

        public CreateWorkflowResponse removeNode(@Nonnull
                                         String endpoint)
                                  throws TimeoutException
        Return a workflow id for this remove operation request.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to remove
        Returns:
        uuid of the remove workflow
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - when the rpc times out

        Returns:
